fields.name: Parameters (checkpoint)
fields.value:
`enchantable` - Determines the enchantability of the item
`enchantable_slot` - The enchantment slot
`enchantable_value` - The enchantment level, integer input
`can_shoot` - Shooter item component
`shooter_max_draw_duration` - How long the item can be drawn before released automatically, decimal input, requires `can_shoot`
`charge_on_draw` - Determines if the item is charged when drawn, requires `can_shoot`
`shooter_scale_power_on_duration` - Scale the power by draw duration? Requires `can_shoot`
`shooter_use_ammo` - Use ammunition? Requires `can_shoot`
`shooter_ammo_search_in_inventory` - Search ammunition in inventory, requires `shooter_use_ammo`
`shooter_ammo_item_to_use` - The entity used as ammunition, requires `shooter_use_ammo`
`shooter_ammo_use_offhand` - Use ammunition in offhand? Requires `shooter_use_ammo`
`shooter_ammo_use_in_creative` - Use ammunition in creative mode? Requires `shooter_use_ammo`
`fertilizer_duration` - Fertilizer duration
`ignore_permission` - Ignores permission
